transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Diwardeep Global Market mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, ma'am, main IndiaMART help line se bol raha hoon customer care se. Bataiye ma'am, aapne kuch request raise kari thi, ek photo bhi bheji thi. Main concern samajh sakta hoon aapka?
Customer: Kya kya chahiye tha?
Executive: Aapne 11:12 pe kuch photos upload ki thi and kuch concern bataya tha hamare chat box mein. To kya dikkat aa rahi thi? Koi dikkat aa rahi thi? Issue aa raha tha aapko?
Customer: Kab? Kal ke din?
Executive: Actually 17 November. Ji, kal ke din 11:00 baje.
Executive: 17 tarikh ko kal 11:00 baje aapne kiya tha.
Customer: Wo haan, wo mujhe URL change karna tha. URL change.
Customer: Haan, meri jo products ka jo hai na, jo customer ko bechti hoon main, wo URL nahi hata. Abhi maine naya naam dala hai na, Diwardeep Global Market. To wo pehle ka naam aa raha hai, Diwardeep Spices karke.
Executive: Achha, jo aapki company ka naam hai Diwardeep Global Market aur pehle ka aa raha hoga Diwardeep Spices, aisa kuch?
Customer: Haan, haan, wo change karna tha.
Executive: Achha. Ek second, aapne apni firm ka naam abhi change kiya hai kya?
Customer: Haan, haan, change kiya hai.
Executive: Aur GST bhi aapne change kar liya hoga?
Customer: Haan, GST maine bheja tha unko. Unhone name to update kiya par URL nahi update kiya.
Executive: Okay, ek minute main dekh leta hoon. Aap line pe rahoge? Main confirm kar raha hoon aapko ki kitni der mein change ho sakta hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Jaldi kijiye please main. Okay, bas just 30 second wait kariye.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Ma'am, main aapko apne WhatsApp number se aapke number pe WhatsApp kar raha hoon abhi. Aap mujhe GST certificate kar dijiye, phir hum bata paate hain. 
Customer: Maine already, maine already GST certificate send karke name change kiya hai ya Diwardeep Global Market kiya hai aur URL ke liye bhi chahiye abhi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi ma'am. Aapne abhi yahan par directly team jo handle karti hai saari, hum wahi team bol rahe hain. Hum better kyunki aapne customer care pe kiya tha, wo redirect hoke complaint hamare paas aayi hai. Ye sara kaam hum dekhte hain. To please. 
Customer: Haan, name update hua hai na URL ke URL ke liye hi aap to URL ke liye bhi ma'am bilkul obviously proof to chahiye hoga na. Ab abhi team mein aaiye. So aap ek baar WhatsApp number batana aap apna?
Customer: Wahan register nahi hai.
Executive: Registered hoga, bilkul hoga. Main registered wale mobile number pe WhatsApp kar dunga, koi dikkat nahi. Haan, wahi WhatsApp kijiye.
Executive: Kyunki ye masked hota hai number. 88 se start hai 360 wale mein? Haan.
Executive: Jo do number hai 360 aur ek 549. Kis wale pe WhatsApp kijiye?
Customer: 360 pe kijiye.
Executive: Okay, aap line pe rahiye, main kar raha hoon.


Executive: Diwar Deep
Executive: Maine aapko hi bhej diya aapke WhatsApp number pe. Aap yahan par mujhe GST provide kara do.

Customer: Haan, kya hai? Kya cheez hai?
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek. Additional trade name hai and trade name theek hai. Main isko kya hai na abhi ma'am ye 6:00 baj gaye. To main isko kal dekh leta hoon. Baki isko change karwa dunga. Theek hai ma'am? 
Customer: Aapne kal hi phone karna tha na?
Executive: Kal phone karna tha but ye complaint jinke paas thi wo ma'am kal leave pe thi. Wo abhi unki tabiyat nahi sahi hai. To 24 ghante tak ticket unke paas rahi. Fir jab wo system pe available nahi thi to call mere paas aayi hai. Then main is ticket pe kaam kar raha hoon kyunki ye case directly mere ko assign nahi hai. Ye jinke paas assign hai wo ma'am abhi leave pe hain because medical conditions ki wajah se. 
Customer: Aur phir bhi time waste hai na abhi abhi kaam mera nahi hua hai. Fir bhi aap yahan 15 to 20 minutes le liye hain. Isi tarah us din bhi us din bhi aapne aisa hi ek ghanta baat baat karke mera kaam nahi kiya tha.
Executive: Ma'am, kaam karne ke liye call kiya gaya hai. Agar kaam agar ye cheez directly inform kari hai, ek process ke tehat hi hoga na. Agar process hai to thoda sa to time jayega. Immediately pe agar kaam hone hota to legal kyunki hume bhi to check karne ka samay chahiye hota hai na ki ye cheeze sahi hai. Okay, okay, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na? As soon as possible. Iske alawa koi aur dikkat?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi.
Executive: Theek hai. Main dekhta hoon URL pe kaise kya ho sakta hoon. Baki main concern close kar sakta hoon?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Main ye concern close kar sakta hoon? Aapka main aage forward kar deta hoon. Haan. Theek. Theek, theek, theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change the URL of products.

- Name updated but URL not updated.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share GST certificate on WhatsApp.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and resolve the issue tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- url, gst, name change, products
